narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Danville-pittsylvania Community Services is a Public Health or Welfare provider based in Danville, VA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $42.5M in Medicaid payments across 226K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $42.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
